p: Dry matter, fat and ash content of BG flour were determined in duplicate according to methods described by Association of Official Analytical Chemists [ 22]. Analysis of protein content was according to the Dumas method using a Flash EA 1112 protein analyser (Thermo Scientific, Netherlands). Protein content was obtained using 5.7 as conversion factor [ 23]. Total starch was measured using AACC-76-13.01/AOAC 996.11 method (Megazyme K-TSTA-50A/K-TSTA) [ 24].
